Baltimore.William Donald Schaefer Building: The William Donald Schaefer Building (a.k.a. William Donald Schaefer Tower or simply Schaefer Tower, previously known as Merritt Tower) is the third-tallest building in the City of Baltimore, Maryland, located at 6 Saint Paul Street, on the northwest corner with East Baltimore Street. Originally completed by Merritt Savings and Loan in 1986 and later re-opened under state management in 1992, the building rises 37 floors and 493 feet (150 m) in height.
